Class NewRayCanvas3D

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Canvas3D, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class NewRayCanvas3D
extends java.awt.Panel
implements Canvas3D
    This class creates a panel where one can draw pixels
    Author:
    Timothy J. Hickey, tim@cs.brandeis.edu http://www.cs.brandeis.edu/~tim
    See Also:
